channel.title: Snippests on Filtrage Numérique
channel.description: Recent content in Snippests on Filtrage Numérique

item.title: Python Cheatsheet
item.description: Affichage d’une sinusoïde import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Fs = 1000 # sampling frequency n = np.arange(Fs) t = n/Fs x = np.sin(2*np.pi*10*t) #plot curve plt.plot(t,x) plt.xlabel("t [s]") plt.ylabel("amplitude") To be continued !
